actions.name: Synchronize

cost.trigger: The user is inflicted with a Major Status Affliction from another creature's effect.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is inflicted with a Major Status Affliction from another creature's effect.

Effect: The triggering creature is also affected by the same Major Status Affliction they inflicted on the user, if possible.
